body:
* fastqvalidator use zlib, but dependency is missing. This PR add zlib dependency.
* fastqvalidaor cannot build to erroneous deletes in Chromosome constructor.  This PR backport to upstream commit https://github.com/statgen/libStatGen/commit/3a10afe08c209dbacc3eca7794a5a8c0a42ee566
title: fastqvalidator: add zlib dependency and  Removes erroneous deletes in Chromosome
